actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the limitations on industrial development bonds.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to remove certain restrictions on the exclusion from gross income of interest on industrial development bonds. Removes restrictions on the excludability of interest on bonds for irrigation dams and solid waste disposal facilities. Repeals requirements relating to the registration and guarantee of governmental obligations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the limitations on industrial development bonds.
